snippet: Taleek Brooks, who worked at Public School 23 in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, faces 15 to 50 years in prison.
abstract: Taleek Brooks, teacher's aide at Public School 23 in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, pleads guilty to charges of making videos of child performing sex acts in classrooms; he faces 15 to 50 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Taleek Brooks, who worked at Public School 23 in Crown Heights, Brooklyn, faces 15 to 50 years in prison.

headline.seo: Teacher’s Aide in Brooklyn Admits Making Pornographic Video of Student
headline.main: Teacher’s Aide Admits Making Pornographic Video of a Student
headline.print_headline: Teacher’s Aide Admits Making Pornographic Video of a Student
